name: dog-website-project
description: Dog website project with SCSS compilation and build tools

scripts.compile: sass src/styles/style.scss src/dist/style.css && sass src/styles/mobile.scss src/dist/mobile.css
scripts.prod: npm run compile && postcss src/dist/style.css --use autoprefixer cssnano --output src/dist/style.min.css && purgecss --css src/dist/style.css --content src/index.html --output src/dist/
scripts.dev: npm run compile && npm run watch

author: Fedotov Oleksandr
